messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Aft Primary Hallway.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body:
Due to rifts in space-time, several highly powerful artifacts may have appeared on your station.

We apologise,

Central Command.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a number of wire eating mammals have descended into the place with all those juicy wires.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Central Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Engineering.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard Summer Town Omega. All personnel must contain the outbreak.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Summer Town Omega door subroutines. Severity level of 3. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Summer Town Omega door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that one of the station's [REDACTED] has developed command level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
CentCom Supply Department

Cargo: Seems we've ordered doubles of our department resupply packages this month. Can we send them to you?
